entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023
